subject: Reminder to activate your account,
body:
This is a reminder to let you know your free trial is ready when you are. Raise your email delivery rates today. 
			To activate your trial you must click on the button below:
 
			
			Here is all your registration info including your username and 
			password. Please keep this email in a safe place.

			EmailReach Registration Info:
			*****************************
			Username: yyzyyz
			Password: 12345678
			***************************** 
			After you log in you are ready to send tests! 
			If you have any questions about getting started please contact us at 
			< info@emailreach.com >. We are here to help!

			Thank-you, 
			The EmailReach Team. 








			To unsubscribe to this email, click here.
